Overview Chapter

class CGOBToolTip

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBToolTipDoes nothing.
~CGOBToolTipSets tooltip text pointer to NULL.
Operations
SetTextPtr Sets the text pointer to the active widgets text.
Overridables
OnDrawDraws the rectangle and text.
Data Members
private
DWORD m_BorderColor;RGB color of border.
DWORD m_FillColor;RGB color of fill.
INT8 m_iBorder;Width in pixels of border.
INT16 m_iXOffset;Unused.
INT16 m_iYOffset;Unused (reserved for offsetting from mouse pos or something).
